title: Trump speaks with presidential seal at crypto dinner billed as private
shortDescription: Trump spoke next to the presidential seal at a dinner for crypto coin investors the White House called a private rather than official event.

title: Lamar Odom booed by hecklers at Trump's crypto dinner
shortDescription: Former NBA player Lamar Odom walked through a throng of booing protesters as he entered a dinner for President Donald Trump's cryptocurrency venture.

title: Trump's tax bill: Impact on Medicaid, SNAP, tax breaks | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Trump administration says Harvard can no longer enroll international students. Plus, NOAA predicts above average hurricane season. It's on The Excerpt.

title: Harvard says it will fight Trump's foreign student ban
shortDescription: The Trump administration's decision to block Harvard University from enrolling foreigners has caused shock and confusion among students. Harvard called the government's move "unlawful" and said it will fight the ban.

title: Trump threatens bite of Apple with 25% tariffs on iPhones
shortDescription: Trump has repeatedly called on Apple to move manufacturing to US from China, but the company shifted production for more than half its phones to India

title: Harvard sues Trump over ban on international students
shortDescription: Harvard University sued the Trump administration on Friday after the Department of Homeland Security revoked its ability to enroll foreign students.

title: Trump threatens 50% tariff on EU, targets iPhones: Live updates
shortDescription: "The European Union... has been very difficult to deal with," Trump said, adding: "Our discussions with them are going nowhere!"

title: Trump hosts controversial crypto dinner
shortDescription: The president hosted top investors in his meme coin and rewarded the biggest buyers with gifts worth about $100,000.

title: Trump says major prisoner swap completed between Russia-Ukraine
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said on Friday that a major prisoner swap was just completed between Russia and Ukraine.

title: 'Harvard refugee': Chinese students seek legal advice after Trump blocks enrollment
shortDescription: Chinese students at Harvard were seeking legal advice after the Trump administration blocked the university from enrolling foreign students.

title: Public schools reject Trump's DEI order. He's coming for their funding
shortDescription: Ivy League colleges aren't the only campuses under fire over DEI initiatives. Now, Trump's orders are taking aim at K-12 public schools.

title: Trump misrepresents photo in Oval meeting
shortDescription: President Donald Trump falsely cited a Reuters video from Congo as proof of "White genocide" during a meeting with the South African president.

title: Supreme Court eases worries over Trump's ability to fire Powell
shortDescription: "The Federal Reserve is a uniquely structured, quasi-private entity," the court's majority wrote.

title: Trump's ex-surgeon general questions new nominee's qualifications
shortDescription: Trump's former surgeon general says holding a medical license is essential for the position. Trump nominee Casey Means doesn't have one.

title: Trump's 'dead White farmers' image showed Congo, not South Africa
shortDescription: Trump showed a screenshot of a Reuters video from the Democratic Republic of Congo. He falsely presented it mass killings of white South Africans.

title: Supreme Court lets Trump keep labor board members sidelined for now
shortDescription: It's a win for Trump's efforts to control agencies meant by Congress to be independent from the president, but the court could exempt the Fed.

title: Judge says Trump administration layoffs are likely illegal
shortDescription: A federal judge on May 22 said she would likely extend her ruling blocking federal agencies from implementing mass layoffs.

title: Trump revokes Harvard's ability to enroll international students
shortDescription: Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem said existing international students at Harvard must transfer or risk losing their legal status.

title: What's next for Trump's big tax bill? An opinionated Senate
shortDescription: Republicans hope to finalize Trump's tax and policy bill by the end of July in order to avoid a debt default.

title: Rep. Andrew Garbarino fell asleep through vote on Trump tax bill
shortDescription: New York Republican Rep. Andrew Garbarino “fell asleep in the back” after an all-night session and inadvertently missed the vote.

title: Former congressional Republicans decry charges against LaMonica McIver
shortDescription: DOJ charges against Rep. LaMonica McIver are "extreme" and "outrageous," according to 11 former Republican lawmakers.

title: Senate makes controversial block of California's electric vehicle mandate
shortDescription: The almost party-line vote repeals a waiver, issued under the Biden administration, allowing California to set their own clean air standards.
